website_summaries.verdict: If you need a powerful fan for an area where noise level is not a concern, this fan might be a good choice.
pros: A basic, mid-size high velocity model that also comes at a mid-range price
Its 20-inch build, strong metal housing, and adjustable 360 degree tilt make it practical for use around the home, garage, shop, and more
cons: A biggest downside (and an important consideration) to this fan is the extreme noise it makes on all three speed settings

customer_reviews.title: This thing blows!
customer_reviews.text: This is the single best fan I have ever owned. I have always owned the typical Walmart 20" box fans and assumed that was how fans were. They work fine or so i thought. Case in point this Soleaire fan on low moves more air than a standard 20.00 box fan on high. The Soleaire fan on high...well its just crazy the amount of air. I will never own another typical box fan after having this.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy  terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it a couple of times and it stopped working. I would not recommend this to anyone. I didn’t mind spending the money as I thought I was getting a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Enos

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty steel fan the real deal
customer_reviews.text: Well I reviewed too soon and after 5 weeks the bearing went out, I stand corrected because the fan is made in China, I appreciate amazon's return policy and the excellent customer service, don't buy this fan
customer_reviews.author: Jess Ussrey

customer_reviews.title: $60 for a fan that stops working after 90 days...
customer_reviews.text: Very angry. Stopped working just short of three months. This fan is way too expensive for that short of a life span. JUNK! DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Mydnight Darkfyre

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but not quiet
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great fan for the price. It moves a lot of air. Don't expect it to be quiet, though. I measured it at around 70 Db standing about 10 feet away. That's roughly as loud as an average vacuum cleaner. It is too loud for me to watch anything with audio on my laptop about 20 feet away. On the plus side, no noise from the outside is discernible when this bad boy is running.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Moses approved fan for parting seas.
customer_reviews.text: Fan lasted for 2 and a half years and then the motor siezed up and wouldnt turn anymore, it would just get hot and smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The product lasted only 3 months and I can’t even return it to Amazon. The fan just stopped spinning as if the motor gave out. 3 months only, I should get something in return.
customer_reviews.author: John Arias

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I use about 20 of these High Velocity Fan - 20" floor fan. on the shop floor. A fan usually lasts between a year and a year and a half. I ordered 13 of these B-Air Firtana fans on 4/28/18. As of 8/6/18, five of the fans have stopped working. Will not order B-Air Firtana fans fans again.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: 2017 and they worked great till they both went out within 2 days of ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these back in Sept. 2017 and they worked great till they both went out within 2 days of each other last month. Was hoping for them to last longer than they did but sadly, they did not.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Palermo

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 28 days
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 fans on June 2nd - by July 3rd 2 out of the 3 fans stopped working. Since it was a holiday week, I did not get back to the office until July 5th. By then the return window was closed. I would love to speak with someone to see if they will warranty these 2 fans..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this about 9 months ago, and it has gotten a LOT of use. Developed a minor issue with a loose blade, so I contacted B-Air. They responded immediately, and shipped out a new fan. Within 5 days of my first contact, I had a replacement fan. Good company, nice fan. If the rivets give me issues out of warranty, I'll drill them all out and replace with machine screws and locknuts. Fan does move a lot of air, and is a bit noisy. But there's few ways to move air quietly, so...there you are.
customer_reviews.author: EchoWars

customer_reviews.title: Fan Information
customer_reviews.text: I like to provide a little info on this fan! The voltage is a 120 volts, has 3 speed setting, the cord is 5 foot, housing & blades are metal,size is 20 inchs, weight around 11 pounds, & has a 1 year warranty! It moves air very well & make noise like your normal fan would, not noisy at all! This is a great fan for a house with no AC, can really circulate the air around the house! You don't see fans made like this anymore!
customer_reviews.author: WilliamTop Contributor: Country Music

customer_reviews.title: Ac broke - this is a life saver
customer_reviews.text: Our A.C. went out and instead of paying the 2k to buy a new one we decided to brave the beginning of summer with fans. I bought 2 Lasko fans in store That work ok. However this fan is like having 5 of those blowing at the same time on top speed. There really is no comparison. This is not a pedestal fan but even sitting on the floor it still works just as well. If this was on a pedestal I would much rather have 1 of these than 3 of my Lasko pedestal fans. Its worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: G.R.

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in late May of 2017. Today is June 3rd, 2018 and this fan is deader than Abe Lincoln. If you decide to purchase this product, you may wish to purchase the extended warranty. Personally, I won't be buying another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write a lot of reviews but I noticed this fan had a lot of mixed reviews. I personally love this fan. I just received it over the weekend and plugged it in right out of the box. Its much lighter than expected, it moves a ton of air, and I don't think its as noisy as some reviews would lead you to believe. I mean, its moving a ton of air so its going to make some noise, but I think its a great fan for the money. It surpassed my expectations. This thing will put a breeze through your whole house if you open adjacent windows and put the fan at one end!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Pelzel Poklemba

customer_reviews.title: It quit working after a 2 months use
customer_reviews.text: I expected my fan to last longer than 90 days from when I used it it was working fine when I left and come in the next couple hours in nothing no noise in the motor nothing it just quit I'm very disappointed I thought it would last at least a year most of them do I've never had one quit this quick
customer_reviews.author: linda scocca

customer_reviews.title: This is a great fan for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan for outdoors. It pushes a lot of air for a small fan. We have two of them and blow them at angles from opposite sides of our deck during the spring and summer when the mosquitos are bad. It is amazing how these two small fans not only keep it a bit cooler, but also move the air such that mosquitos can't (or at least have a harder time) landing on us. Great fan for the money. I'm glad we didn't spend more on a bigger fan. These do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Upton

customer_reviews.title: POWERFUL AIR FLOW!!️!!️!!️
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these fans for my Son and Daughter-In-Law. They just recently moved to Colorado and their rental house, does NOT have central air. I didn’t want them and their 2 dogs to be miserable in the high 89 degree temperatures, so I knew they needed fans with maximize wind felocity. They were delivered within a couple of days and my son phoned me, with His overjoyed relief from the heat. He made mention, that even their two fur babies, were enjoying them. As a side note, to a testament to their power...my son said, the fan wind is so strong, that it blew over a stack of folded t-shirts👍👍!!️!!️ I HIGHLY—recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: The Mrs Jones- Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Loud but effective
customer_reviews.text: In lieu of portable a/c...teen boys room is small and wouldnt cool down..(as much as I cut the heat or pump home's a/c)Super loud though..he can't hear outside the room with the door closed, or communicate through headset while gaming. But it's cool. Refreshing. The noise is fine for sleeping...if you like white noise.
customer_reviews.author: hppymom

customer_reviews.title: Too loud for home use.
customer_reviews.text: Too loud for home use. Much louder than the Lasco 20" box fan. Cannot use it in bedroom because it is too loud. Not sure what industrial use it would be suitable for but this fan is way too loud for a sleep aid. Yes, it is solid. Yes, it seems to be well made. Yes, it blows more air than any fan i have ever owned. But it I simply cannot use it in the home without fear of doing damage to my hearing. Wish Decibel Level and Air Displacement were things we could search by on Amazon but that's off topic.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Larkby

customer_reviews.title: powerful
customer_reviews.text: i always use a fan when i play on stage and this fan delivers powerful airflow for me. keeps me cool in the summer and i use one for the fans dancing on the floor and the love to dance in front of the other fans i have out in front..
customer_reviews.author: jack Blade

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Fan motor went out. Less than two months of use. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is awesome. It's got a lot of power to it so it will definitely keep you cool. It's also great at drawing in air from a window. Only con I can think of is that it is somewhat loud. Not the type of loud that makes your neighbors think "What the hell is that noise?" more of a "What the hell did she say?" as you turn up your TV volume. For pet owners, the grids are small enough so you don't have to worry about paws or tails getting in there. My roommates' cats were initially startled by the fan (noise) but now they sit next to it as they people watch at the window.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This fan was amazing. It moved more air than it should have..... for less than 2 months..... now it doesn’t work. I’d suggest buying a different fan that is backed with a return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Reed

customer_reviews.title: Very Noisy - But That's What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this fan because I wanted the noise. So if you are looking for something quiet this isn't it. If I have my bedroom door closed I can hear the fan running both in other rooms on the same floor and the attic or basement. Unlike my last giant metal fan for white noise, this one will hold on the position you set it on and it also doesn't vibrate itself across the floor forcing me to prop it against the wall with a towel. Came on time, packaging was fine. Moves a lot of air. Good for summer sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Orcinus_orca

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a need for the summer!
customer_reviews.text: The fan blows lots of air perfect for everyday use. Had it for months now so I wanted to give a honest review and wait sometime for better results. Get it, you will like it. Came from my own pocket, with tax, worth the money. Trust, If it was trash...I am the first to let you know. Believe me and you lol! I will for sure let you know, knowing me if it was 👌😂.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very good fan. Not too noisy.
customer_reviews.text: Great fan. Blows hard. Seems a bit lightweight so I don't expect the same material life as my heavier models but it looks nice and the price was right It's not as powerful as the heavier duty models, but it's not as expensive either I use a ton of diff fans at work (full scale renovation/remodeling) & we have a few for our patio & pool area; I'm accustomed to high-velocity noise levels. For HiVel this fan really isnt noisy. If you want it for a small room or aptmt maybe dont go HiVel unless you like white noise. I wish it had tension knobs at 9&3 to hold it in position. Cord looks decent and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ccc

customer_reviews.title: No true "slow" setting but works great and moves a ton of air
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan, it moves a lot of air. It is a little louder than I expected because the lowest setting is still pretty aggressive. However, for my needs it works great: I have a very large 2 story foyer that is open to the entire rest of the house. I use the fan on days when it's extra hot or cold to keep the air from being "stuck" in the foyer. It moves the air around and has enough power to move air into and out of other rooms nearby as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan C Cox

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could love this fan.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it definately moves the air! Mighty powerful and right size to tuck in a corner....but the noise is like a train right on top of you. Don't even try to watch TV while this beauty is running. It is impossible and the neighbors will definately complain. Lots of air circulation and powerful enough to dry surfaces. At this point I am not sure what to do...send it back for a refund. But if I don't how can I continue to use such a deafening product in my apartment. I sure as hell cannot afford to ship it back!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra C.

customer_reviews.title: This thing blows
customer_reviews.text: Moves a lot of air. If it's hot, this helps it "feel" cooler because of the wind. It helps exhaust air of of a hotter-than-ambient garage. If there are lots of bugs that keep on pestering you while working, they can't land on you when you got the fan on. Definitely worth it. So much better than the lousy twenty dollar box window fans.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking, buy this fan!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I can't believe how well this fan works. I've [always] used throw-away box-fans but, never realized I could move so much air for so little money; I'll never look back. The fan was well packaged and was a [literal] snap to assemble. I've yet to need to use it on any higher setting that the lowest and it moves 10-times the air of those inexpensive box-fans. It's a nice-clean fan that's well balanced; out-of-the-box. You just can't go wrong purchasing yourself this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Ryk0

customer_reviews.title: THESE DIE too quickly AND the price has gone up!
customer_reviews.text: Our family has purchasd 2 of these. 1 exactly 1 year ago today - and it just died after not being very high in CFM compared to a different model we replaced with. The other was 2 years ago, and it died about 6 months ago. We did use these full time during 6-9 months of the year, in basement gym and bedroom for air circulation and noise (can't stand silence when we sleep). Very disappointed that they have not made it longer, as we have been fan people for 20 years and seen much better value. I was even more surprised to see this same model is now higher than the 39.99 we paid in past years. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Loud and very powerful!!!
customer_reviews.text: For serious fan lovers. This fan on the lowest setting will blow like 3 fans on high setting and is just as loud! I sleep with a fan on at night time so the noise is okay with me. but if I was trying to watch Television for example, this would not be an option to have running for it would drown out any volume from the Tv. I have only used it on the low setting and has worked above and beyond expectations. I keep this fan at the foot of my bed and it actually blows my blanket up to my neck if I don't tuck it in.
customer_reviews.author: Theone

customer_reviews.title: Great fan! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT fan! Yes, it’s a bit noisy because it’s big and it moves a lot of air. For a house without A/C on a hot day, though, it cools the whole area off better than any fan I’ve ever used and doesn’t bother pets. We run it on the lowest speed. It is light and easy to move around and adjust. Nice safety set up around the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Hen

customer_reviews.title: These fans blow
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the value for price. Super easy to assemble, no tools required. Blows lots of air. I bought two. One for each entry door to our house. They helped keep the flies and mosquitos out of the house during a baby shower we hosted. I saved the boxes for easy storage in winter months since these are so easy to disassemble. It also has a handy hook for neatly tying up the power cord.
customer_reviews.author: TonyFu

customer_reviews.title: Longevity issue?
customer_reviews.text: Use these in my barn and home. They do move quite a bit of air. However, if you are using this in a barn setting- clean these often. I have gone through 2 of these this year alone in the barn- even with regular cleaning. I gave 3 stars because there seems to be a longevity issue as a whole with these. I am not buying these again for the barn or house due to this.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi A.

customer_reviews.title: FANfreakntastic!
customer_reviews.text: Would have been so easy to give this fan 5 stars had the cord been longer. Good thing this fan is so wonderful otherwise or I'd have slain it knocking off stars for that ridiculously short cord; will definitely limit you on its location. But brother does it ever circulate some big air! Bought this for the dogs and so far have only needed to run it for 3 - 4 hours per day. All told, super fan!
customer_reviews.author: More of That

customer_reviews.title: Piece broke off?!
customer_reviews.text: THis is actually my second fan. Why the low review? I was in love with the first one! That's why I ordered a second one. It fills up my gym with circulating air beautifully. However the second one made a "clicking" noise when it was starting up and powering down. I didn't think anything of it and couldn't see what it was. Just this morning... a whole lot of clanging goes on. A piece broke off on the inside and now it doesn't work. Why was the second fan so shoddy? Really disappointed. I've included photos.
customer_reviews.author: Charly

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I purchased this fan is because my neighbor let me borrow his for a short while, due to failure of my previous one. This fan is ..... Simple (in its assembly and operation) Powerful & Reliable. My top three must haves, unless I’m looking for specific technological functions. Otherwise, with my smart plug set up now, it does much more than I expected. Plug in Set analog dial to one of three speeds.... Lo-med-hi Activate smart plug.
customer_reviews.author: Sejo

customer_reviews.title: Bracket does not lock, the fan swings/ no good
customer_reviews.text: I'm updating this review. I have this fan and already it's showing signs of becoming a "swing". It's amazing, I've seen this fan go up in price by like 20 dollars and yet those who buy it will regret it later. You'll have to replace the bracket as the "tilt" angle feature wears out.
customer_reviews.author: PINKY

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan! This fan can really move a lot of air.. don't stand in front of it, or it will blow you over. It is a little loud, but the breeze is worth it. Would not hesitate to recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Great fan with minimal noise that moves a ton of air.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on nearly every fan that was similar to this one and it appears I made a great choice. This fan is lightweight, cranks out some major air and is not loud at all in my opinion. It's not whisper quiet but it's certainly not the jet plane sound that I've heard others mention in some of these reviews. This fan moves a LOT of air with minimal noise. I'm going to buy more of these for my garage and camper. A great product at a really good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R Hammonds

customer_reviews.title: High Volocity?
customer_reviews.text: It depends on what you call High Velocity. This fan just blows a Fair, OK, Decent amount of Breeze, nothing special as we have owned a few other similar "High Velocity" floor fans which could blow this fan away! BUT, it offers a decent amount of comfort but only because of it's price. A decent value. If this fan is reliable and lasts several years of heavy use we'll be plenty happy. It's OK but If you want it to blow your hat off spend more $$$...
customer_reviews.author: Mikeymax

customer_reviews.title: On my 3rd one, will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Sacramento, and it's Africa-hot in spring, summer, fall, and occasionally winter. Need one of these for every room, patio, and garage. Can't sleep in summer without one circulating the air. Can't work in the garage without one running. Have used dozens of other brands over the years, and have dealt with motor failure each time, usually before a year's use. Easiest to setup and longest-lasting fan I've purchased, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Klomp

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wast your Money if using in a Garage
customer_reviews.text: So lightweight I have 4 others that are just like this one. If it gets sawdust or any dust it seizes the Motor I keep cleaning them taking apart cleaning but now just dead. They really need a dust filter
customer_reviews.author: Theotterhunter

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to garage gym in summer heat in the South
customer_reviews.text: We live in NC and during pandemic everyone has been trying to get workouts at home. The gym is the area in which we have set up weights, jump rope, etc. for workouts. Being in the south it is incredibly hot and humid. This fan does a great job of circulating the air to make the heat bearable, and came at a good price. For a larger space such as a garage, I would recommend two, especially if multiple people are working out at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: The best floor fan that i have owned
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best floor fan that have owned. Puts out twice the amount of air at a further range, than my plastic wind machine fan. It is keeping me cool during these hot summer days with no ac. The back gets warm but not hot. Only thing i am worried about is my power bill. Which i will have to wait and see. But this fan is great. Buy it if you are on the fence. Steel is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: jerad

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just about year
customer_reviews.text: After about 10 months the fan speed slowed, but I thought nothing of it. A month later it started to squeak, loudly and it got hot, fire threat hot. Then the blades finally stopped turning. Next time, I'll but a cheap plastic fan on sale for $20 and if I replace it 3 times in three years, it'll still be cheaper. I was happy with it for the first 10 months I had it and when I spend almost $60 on a fan I expect it to last a a couple years. I think that is a reasonable expectation.
customer_reviews.author: LuminousPC

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this fan keep you cash in ypur pocket.
customer_reviews.text: I havent had this fan but for 2 weeks and it just stop working. Way to costly to be having this out of it. Horrible product. Dont buy. But i love how amazon replaced in a day. Amazon is great on response. Oh also the noise level is to loud. Didnt have to assemble already assembled. But its great on keeping you cool when its working
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, portable fan
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these and they are helping circulate the A/C in our house & keep us cool this hot summer! We have a 2 story house, with a slightly older A/C and ducting system that doesn't quite keep the upstairs cool enough on the hot days. We strategically placed 2 of these fans to optimize the air flow and have been keeping the whole house nice and cool this summer. They are very strong, even on the low setting. This was much easier than installing a ceiling fan.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa D

customer_reviews.title: Extremely NOISY!
customer_reviews.text: I ran this fan for about a minute and then turned it off and boxed it back up. It was soo noisy, that I could not have a normal conversation with my Wife, or listen to the tv. It does blow air, but I would only recommend this fan for a garage or shed, where noise is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lonestar 38

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves it. He sleeps with a fan and man does this blow a lot of air. It's right on the edge of the bed and in my opinion fairly large for that space, but like I said, he loves it. I personally am having a bit of trouble telling the difference between the low and high settings, they all seem pretty high to me. I might get another one for the living room come summer.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter!

customer_reviews.title: It is a very durable fan.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a wonderfully loud fan to drown out noise and circulate lots of air then look no further. I purchased this fan in December of 2016 and it still works perfectly. I use it all night, every night to allow for a peaceful night's rest. I often use it all day in the summer as well so it is indeed a very durable fan.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I want another one to put in living/kitchen area. This fan moves air..i sometimes point it up so it hits wall or ceiling and bounces back down on you. Strong air flow...i love this fan. UPDATE today is 4/26/2020 Both fans quit on me 1 last week, the 2nd one today. Did NOT last 1 year. I need a fan to last me due to i live in a trailer that has no insulation and it gets hot in here...outside might be 70s but it gets 90's inside here. I am upset over both fans that cost me money quit on me.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine R.

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed and Powerful !
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a Beast ! First it's very well made , all metal parts, good construction, no flimsy parts and Powerful? OMG, the lowest setting will Blow you away , never mind Mid and Full ! Very happy, highly recommend for home or shop ! For garage/shop it's very ideal, does not take much room like those commercial behemoth square shop fans costing $500+. this is powerful enough for a large shop.
customer_reviews.author: VintageFordsLee

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product control and parts. Fan almost burnt up before 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Woke up to smoke detector going off. The fan almost caught fire completely. I purchased it on June 8th and it arrived a couple days later. So I haven't even had this thing for 3 months yet. Do not buy!!!!!! I had another fan a Holmes and that lasted 16 years!!!!! Despicable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thurman

customer_reviews.title: defect fan
customer_reviews.text: hello.... i bought this fan as a gift we stay in chicago it's been hot for 2 day i used the fan and on the 3rd stay it just stop working no warning just stopped there was no reason to check it out in the winter can something anything be done about this matter....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shop Fan, Noisy House Fan
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this during this summer's heat wave so that we could move our Vornado upstairs permanently. Compared to the Vornado's <1000cfm, this thing's 4600cfm is amazing. It first we just set it on the living room floor, but it got to be too much so we pointed it out the back door - the whole downstairs gets a nice air flow from it that way. Our only real complaint is that it's really really noisy, but we live in an area where air conditioning is unfeasible so we'll put up with the noise for a few weeks a year.
customer_reviews.author: S. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Delivered June 7 and worked great. It really puts out a stiff breeze. It’s noisy because of the amount of air flow but the motor is quiet. I would rate it a 4 for the first two months. Starting early August, the motor started getting very hot and by the second week of the month, the motor became extreme y noisy it’s unusable due to the noise and over heating.
customer_reviews.author: awedbyYou

customer_reviews.title: A +++  Good High Quality
customer_reviews.text: moves a ton of air ! I have been running it 24/7 for a few months. this is 2nd one, nothing wrong with 1st one, but I kicked it walking by & guard hit 1 blade & bent it,no way to fix, bending back doesn't work, balance wobble to bad, fins are riveted on aluminum stamping & I can not find new ones,so I have a fan for spare parts I guess.LOL
customer_reviews.author: dmmann

customer_reviews.title: Move tons of air
customer_reviews.text: WHOAH! Tons of air coming out of these! We bought two for our warehouse and they really push out air. Excellent quality and I hope they last because we run them 24 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: If you smell burning/melting plastic try high or replacing it
customer_reviews.text: When using this fan on Low it emits a burning/melting plastic smell. Was very worrisome! I turned it to high (which is co plate overkill as you can imagine) and the smell goes away. Nervous to keep using it after that smell (which still happens a few minutes after turning it down) but havent smelled it since turning it to high when I have it on. Likely just wont use it further and get a refund this week before it starts an electrical fire.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ive made
customer_reviews.text: I have an older house with window units, When summer hits with temps 105 and up it gets warm and over whelms my wall units, This fan has made a HUGE difference as the air is not being circulated. It isnt super loud but its not totally silent but thats ok. Sturdy all metal, swivels nicely . Settings feel like real settings. Ive had it since yesterday, and slept like a baby last night
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Copley

customer_reviews.title: Well,  Since August 9 2017
customer_reviews.text: Took delivery August 9th 2017 and this fan has run 24 - 7 365 I have tore it down twice for a though cleaning, the motor is still as free as the day it was made. I have to have a fan, been that way since i was ten years old. This fan moves the air and it has the perfect fan noise. Solid and well designed and for 38 bucks it cant be beat. Ordering 2 more
customer_reviews.author: KET19

customer_reviews.title: Blow me away
customer_reviews.text: I found a great deal on this fan, I purchased it to replace a cheepo plastic fan that I use in my room and bathroom, I tend to run warm when I am doing my makeup and hair. This fan has great power and air flow, I did find it a little loud and even a bit too powerful for use in a bedroom, it would be a better fit for a garage, work space, or as a home or small job utility fan to dry paint, wet floors, etc. The stand jets out a couple inches in the front and rear, providing good stabilization but also takes up a little more room.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for the garage.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than even the ones they have at Wal-mart, never heard of this manufacturer but it works like a champ! I run this in the garage during my working on cars and projects and in the 100 degree heat it keeps a nice breeze on me. Works great to exhaust fumes and keeps the bugs off me outside. Running for 10-12 hours a day it was not overly heated and was still capable of touching/picking it up.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 for my Workshop/Garage - Gamechanger
customer_reviews.text: These are seriously powerful fans. The noise is not quiet by any means but I play music or watch football while they are on and just have to turn the volume up some. The noise doesn't strike me as ear damaging but don't expect silent operation. The fans are powerful, I mounted them on my ceiling on a swivel I made and when you turn one on it will spin the mount if I don't turn the other one quickly or secure it with a cord or cable. They truly are game changing though, in 80 degrees inside my shop they keep me cool and comfortable while working on projects.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R Munoz

customer_reviews.title: noisy
customer_reviews.text: This is a light weight fan but seems well made. The low setting acts more like the high setting of most other fans so this moves a lot of air. I wanted to use this in my bedroom but it's too loud for me. Others might find the noise level to work like white noise and lull them to sleep. This fan moves a lot of air and can be felt across a large room. Might be best for your garage, patio or a large gathering room. Even though I didn't use it for the bedroom I did keep it and am happy using it in the kitchen, dinning area. Cools it down fast.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Like an Architect blast on a hot day.
customer_reviews.text: B-Air is way better then any fan I’ve ever purchased, at first when I pulled it out of the box it looked to be too small to do the job of cooling my room, boy was I wrong. It might be smaller then other brands but it has a very strong motor and speeds that will satisfy anyone even on a hot day it’s like it’s making the air cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia D. Ashford

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Lots of air flow! Great purchase 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Insane! Love it ! I needed something to move sir and dust for home renovation project and wow did this work great! So much air! Not loud ... average noise for a fan. I cleaned it up after the project and use it upstairs to keep central air flowing ... our upstairs gets warm even with the AC on do this fan is helping ! Going to order another one soon for when I’m working in the shed ! Totally love this fan! Really moves/blows a lot of air! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Frank & Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, adaptable, very windy!
customer_reviews.text: First of in terms of sound, as far as it goes for industrial 20x20 fan , the sound is not irritating. Yes it feels like much when you first turn it on but you will soon realize that the white noise has a low pitch and Becomes second nature very quickly. I use it when working in my tiny studio and to get some air flowing in the house. I would say it’s a midway btw room fan and warehouse. Perfect for a loft or a big interior.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these so far!
customer_reviews.text: I try to avoid turning on the AC as much as possible, and purchased these to try and improve circulation. They're very strong! I am going to see how well they hold up over the next few months and if they do well I'll be buying a couple more. I'm planning to mount two in my basement to improve the airflow down there if they hold up, and use the other two as needed upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING BLOWS!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for horse show use, but have it set up in my house because ac is getting fixed. Impressive how quiet yet powerful! Have read about dangers of cheap box fans igniting at barns, so this sealed, three-prong fan is far safer and moves way more air. Sturdy wire cage, arrived intact and ready to attach the base. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Tropicalle

customer_reviews.title: Lots of air
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these fans and they move air!! They are loud and you would need to turn your tv up or the fan down to far it better. This isn’t a big deal to me. I just love how it moves the air around my room and keeps cooler feeling .
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Loud but awesome cooling
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about the fan except the noise. I have to max out the volume on the television just to hear it when the fan is running but it cools the room better that any window unit could. Mine is in a 20x40 living space and I have to run it on low because it cools that well
customer_reviews.author: dregrit williams

customer_reviews.title: good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: not too easy, had to fiddle with it to get both pegs lined up enough to fit. it is very noisy. think of any tall standing fan on high, and thats how loud this is on low. very powerful airflow though, so dont have anything lightweight in its direct path. paper, bags, and small items will go flying. for noise, it has three thin metal blades, to reduce noise, more blades is better. 8 is the optimal number.
customer_reviews.author: Spike Hun

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our garage and it's perfect. It was super easy to put together, literally just clips together. It puts out a lot of cool air! I would say, if you care about noise, it is not quiet. For a garage though or similar application, it's fantastic. It's not too heavy to move around either.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G.

customer_reviews.title: Floor Fan - Background Noise
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this fan in August 2018, it failed last night. We turn it on medium every night and keep it in the hallway by our three kid's room as a sort of white noise effect, and also to move air around upstairs. I'm fairly happy with two years on a fan we ran 10-12 hours almost every day. Fan moved a lot of air so we were always pleased by the effectiveness of the design.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Good fan
customer_reviews.text: I noticed this fan had a lot of mixed reviews. I personally love this fan. I plugged it in right out of the box. Its much lighter than expected, it moves a ton of air, and I don't think its as noisy as some reviews would lead you to believe. I mean, its moving a ton of air so its going to make some noise, but I think its a great fan for the money. It surpassed my expectations. This thing will put a breeze through your whole house if you open adjacent windows and put the fan at one end!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Crespo

customer_reviews.title: Really moves the air
customer_reviews.text: The best air-moving fan I've ever owned. This is nice because it has a more narrow profile yet it works better than a bigger fan I have. I'm really impressed with this. The noise is not a big distraction but it's hard for a fan like this to be silent. We have vaulted ceilings and I use this to mix the air when our AC is on in the hot summer months as we have no ceiling fans. It singlehandedly keeps the upstairs cool. Very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: S. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: B-Air Firtana Fan
customer_reviews.text: If you want a 20" fan that pushes a lot of air with a little noise at a good price this is the fan. This thing pushes a lot of air on high but it does make a little noise which is understandable being the amount of air it is pushing which if you turn it down to low it is still pushing a good amount of air but not as much noise.
customer_reviews.author: Gleger

customer_reviews.title: She stays put and blows hard!
customer_reviews.text: I got exactly what I was hoping for. She does the job well! She is pretty loud compared to a box fan but this fan is boss for an outdoor/garage type of bloweth. Super blowy! I would have liked tightening bolts for the up/down motion-swivel, to keep it from blowing itself off, but she stays put and seems moyty toyt! I dig the fan, perf delivery, no hassles - Pro state - Super Much Apreesh!
customer_reviews.author: Rymatt

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Needed a fan that was loud for night time. This was the one. However, 2 months has gone by and the highest speed is now the lowest speed and just last night, the blades seized up waking both me and my wife up sounding like dying animal got stuck within it. We loved this until this happened. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: Use this fan to sleep. Was tired of using the cheap plastic fans you get at the box stores. This fan is loud on low. It really moves a lot of air. I was lucky since a week after it arrived my second floor AC unit went out. It really helped with moving the air and kept us from suffocating.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Got this fan so I can work out in the garage during COVID. It's pretty loud even when I put it on the lowest setting so I can hear my workout app on my phone. It circulates that hot air nicely so I'm not overheating. The highest setting is the first position, but I wish it was the last position since I never use the highest setting. Don't worry about outside noise. You'll probably won't hear it it over the fan.
customer_reviews.author: MaruMaro

customer_reviews.title: It Moves the Air - No Doubt About It
customer_reviews.text: I had a fan of this style before. It was twice as heavy and could move air for 25 feet. I wanted a smaller version of that same fan and this one is perfect. It is a little noisy, even on the lower speeds, but it definitely moves the air. I use it outside. On high, it will even blow the bugs away.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Looking For a Fan to Push a Lot of Air, This Is It!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to move air into bedrooms. This thing moves air! I have two central AC units in my home. The smaller unit for 2 bedrooms went down. I needed to blow as much cold air into the two bedrooms from the main part of my home. Because of the open cage design & velocity this fan does just that. So if you're looking for a fan to move a lot of air at a decent price point, this is it! Noise level is somewhat high, but expected. Sounds like a small plane taking off in the distance. Lol! You get used to it. Heck we sleep with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: It blows air well. It is loud.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and has good breeze generation. It is top notch in that category. The box states "quiet." I would not label as quiet. All three settings make about the same noise and it is loud. I'd recommend if the noise isn't a problem. The fan blows. If you are looking for a quiet fan, this isn't for you.
customer_reviews.author: MRM

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: This fan is excellent. It’s a workhorse. I hung it from the ceiling in my garage on hooks (upside down) and it pivots great, runs like a champ, and moves big air all day. Yes it’s a little loud but not that loud and duh, it’s a fan moving air.
customer_reviews.author: 5STAR

customer_reviews.title: Way better than even 2 box fans!
customer_reviews.text: The base isn't on it outa the box but it just snaps on. Easy peasy. There's something about me and fans (and freezers) I kill em quick. Lol I'll let ya know ;) Oh, and it will blow you away with pretty low noise on high. -Life lessons With Leslie ;)
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan
customer_reviews.text: This thing is high velocity and kicks out tropical storm winds. Lol. Not quite that powerful but it’s definitely an awesome fan. We’ve only had it a couple of months so I can’t speak on its longevity but so far it’s been great We’ve used it camping and on the back patio to keep the heat and mosquitoes at bay, When working in the garage, to dry the motorcycle and/or lawnmower if it rains. Highly recommend this fan.
customer_reviews.author: kspence

customer_reviews.title: Circulate air Very well. Happy with the Product.
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my Attic which gets really Hot in summer. Attic gets Hot up-to 110F. This fan brings the temperature 20F down and attic temperature is around 90F on a hot day. I been using it 12Hrs a day past 2 months and no issue so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mubi

customer_reviews.title: Loud loud loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan in hopes of cooling my apt bedroom but it's very powerful and loud for any small space. This should be used in an industrial area, or a cellar where it can cool the whole basement. It doesn't oscillate s it's impossible to ease the blast of air. Also too heavy for me to package it up to send back. The delivery man carried it to my apartment. Inappropriately loud for small apt.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: A really "COOL" fan!
customer_reviews.text: This fan works well to keep air flow through our single level house. It is noisy but I have not had any fans that were not. The three speed settings allow us to adjust the speed to decrease the amount of noise and still keep some air flow.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: BELIEVE THE 1 STAR⭐ REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: Well, I had better fortune than a lot of your dissatisfied customers, my fan lasted almost 2 years, but we rarely used it. It just stopped working. Definitely they don't build them to last. I don't recommend buying this disposable fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after five weeks
customer_reviews.text: The fan lasted just a few days past Amazon's return window. I bought it on Jun 23 and it died on Jul 28. Worked great for four weeks and then just seized up and won't turn anymore. Definitely not industrial or commercial quality gear. Update: I contacted B-Air about a warranty replacement unit and they agreed to ship me a new one. It arrived on Aug 7. I'm upping the review to two stars for now. If the replacement fan makes it past five weeks, I'll add some more stars and write off the dead fan as a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: steevithak

customer_reviews.title: Stops working
customer_reviews.text: This fan worked great. Light regular use off and on between spray jobs and summer heat. Now it doesn't work at all. Motor went out? I would not purchase another one of these ever. One year warranty, quit after 16 months. Probably around 50 hours on it total. Junk. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Only had this fan since last summer and it already does not work. It ran hot all the time and was not quiet. I would not waste money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Consuelo Miller

customer_reviews.title: It’s a beast
customer_reviews.text: This is my second fan. The first I ran day and night last year. I never turned it off. Even when I left the house. I know dumb. But I didn’t want to have to wait for the room to get cool again. This fan is a beast. It just keeps going. So I ordered a second one. I have no complaints. I had a 120.00 shop fan that died after one season. So this fan is a bargain to me. It’s the little engine that can.
customer_reviews.author: strongium90

customer_reviews.title: A Great Fan! Get one!!
customer_reviews.text: I like white noise to help me sleep and this does an excellent job. The sound really offers a great white noise. It’s powerful and really moves a lot of air. If you want a very good powerful fan, definitely get one of these!
customer_reviews.author: mikedeerfish

product_meta.title: B-Air FIRTANA-20X High Velocity Electric Industrial and Home Floor Fan, 20"
product_meta.description:
This UL Certified multi-purpose fan, possesses a tilt adjustable feature to focus air flow for where air is needed. Comes with 3 speeds for maximum air flow. The motor in this unit is open, not enclosed. Tilt adjustable to direct precise movement Durable metal housing to withstand tough environments. Ideal for cooling and/or drying garages, workshops and kitchens. Comes with a 1 year warranty.



Specifications

 * Voltage: 120V
 * Amperage: 1.35A
 * Wattage: 157 Watts
 * 3 Speeds (High/Medium/Low): 1507/1360/1253
 * RPM Cord: 18 AWG, 5 Feet
 * Size: 24" x 22.3" x 6"
 * Weight, Net/Gross: 12, 15 lbs
 * CFM: 4650
 * Wall Hanger Not Included
feature_bullets: WIND TO KEEP YOU COOL - Whether you're working with machinery in a large shop, warehouse, or winding down after work outdoor on your patio enjoying a drink, our 20-inch fan will meet your cooling needs.
POWERFUL - Our fans will help you get through those hot summer days where you need real air flow when those heat waves hit. Great for those that like loud white noise while sleeping.
VERSATILE - 3 speed settings, tilt adjustable, portable handle, and UL certification to keep you safe. Keep it on the floor or hang it on the wall in your kitchen to circulate the hot air out.

STRONG AND STURDY - All metal heavy duty housing that is easy to assemble and take apart for easy and convenient maintenance. Small grid spacing to keep out accidental fingers and paws from getting in.
WARRANTY - 1 year Warranty. At B-Air, we engineer quality, durable, and reliable products. We stand by our products and hope you do too.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,755 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
